website_summaries.verdict: You won't get a lot of fancy features, but you will love the results and the price. The best pizzelle maker for bakers on a budget.
pros: Extremely fast — some consumers report pizzelles ready in as little as 20 seconds
cons: It runs quite hot and doesn't have temperature control

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled !!!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled ! Received this yesterday and made my first batch today, using Caterina Casole's recipe in the manual. Baker performed perfectly - 15 seconds per pizzelle - no sticking, no burning...... I made 22 pizzelle and 18 cannoli shells in ~ 1/2 hour -- one note.... the amount of batter you should put on the plate is about the size of a walnut. I started too large and had to trim a few.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela F. Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give this ten stars!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, this is the pizzelle iron you’re looking for. Perfect pizzelles, and quick and easy to use. I didn’t have to grease the iron, which is a huge plus. The pizzelles come out thin and crispy. Reminds me of the ones my Italian grandmother used to make! The recipe that I used was: 4 eggs 1 cup sugar 3/4 cup softened butter 2 cups flour 2 teaspoons baking powder 1/8 tsp salt 1tbs vanilla
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Compact design
customer_reviews.text: For the last several years I've wanted pizzelle around the holidays but couldn't find them in any nearby bakeries, this year I decided to bite the bullet and buy a press for myself. I'm so glad that I did. This press is a perfect size, I like the size pizzelle it makes along with the compact design. The press works quickly (around 22 seconds I found) per two pizzelles and they're super easy to slide off with a spatula. I look forward to using this more!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Dip

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and tastier than store-bought
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying pizzelles at the grocery store because I like making instant ice cream sandwiches with them (something I remember from my childhood), but those cost about $6 a box. After finding one of these on Warehouse Deals for $26 on Prime Day, it seemed like a cheaper alternative in the long run. In 5 batches, this pizzelle maker will pay for itself, and I get the great fun of using it! The batter is really easy to whip up, and the machine is a breeze to use once you figure out the consistency you like. The thickness of the cookies is perfect for cone, bowl and cannoli shapes, and the non-stick surface works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: CembalistaTop Contributor: Pianos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The Chef’s choice 834 Pizzelle Pro works exceptionally well. I use the recipe that’s included which I cut in half and it is delicious. The unit works perfectly and you just wipe it off with a damp cloth to clean. Perfect at Christmas and other holidays. So glad I purchased this unit. My Grandson loved helping me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kane

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Cooks too hot and does not spread the mixture evenly on the griddle surface. The edges came out brown, while the centers were white. Some of the pizzelles were too thick. I've been making pizzelles for 20 years on a different brand machine and they came out much better, until that machine, which doesn't seem to be readily available anymore, went south on me.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November of 2017 and loved it the first 2 years I used it. This year when I used it, it was so hot on the top lid that my pizzelles burned on top and were white on the bottom half. Then after a couple dozen pizzelles it started sticking on top. I let it cool, cleaned it, seasoned it and started over. It immediately stuck again. Tried it again the next day and the pizzelles immediately stuck on the top lid. What a waste. I threw it out! My last pizzelle iron lasted 30 years. 2 years is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the way it cooked the Pizzelles
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with this Pizzelle maker. I bought this Pizzelle maker because my other Pizzelle maker bit the dust during Christmas. I just knew that I needed to get another one quickly. When the Pizzele maker arrived via UPS I unpacked it and followed the instructions for seasoning it. I was happy with the way it cooked the Pizzelles, they were uniformed in size and shape. I also like the easy locking latch it is so easy to open and close. I hope to use this one for as long as I had the other Pizzelle make (12 years). I would recommend this Pizzelle maker to anyone, the price is right and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: barb stugart

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. Within no time I had 2 Batches of Pizzelle's done. I love it. Not sorry 1 bit . So easy to clean. Now I don't mind making them. I will definitly be making them more often....
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Pizelle fun!
customer_reviews.text: I found a great gluten free recipe and this is about as simple as it can get. I love this product. My husband is challenged with several dietary constrictions and these cookies are a simple grab-and-go tidbit. They freeze well and are versatile for adding toppings or rolling and filling with fruit. Cleanup is a breeze. It never required more than a wipe down with a paper towel, even when I burnt a couple. They take 20 to 25 seconds to cook (two at a time) and the recipe I use makes 3 dozen. It's faster than baking a cookie in the oven and almost as fast as no-bakes. So fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Sock Knitter

customer_reviews.title: No sticking!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished making a batch of chocolate pizzelles from a recipe where many reviewers complained that the cookies stuck to their pizzelle makers. I am happy to report that my Toscano PizzellePro looks as clean at this moment as the day it was delivered. I have experienced the sticking problem in previous machines that I have owned so I know how frustrating it can be. This pizzelle maker is absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy and certainly don't gift it to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this pizzelle iron to my daughter for Christmas. She used it for the first time in March and it came apart, see picture. Return window is already closed. My advice buy something else somewhere else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just added more anise and they were perfect. above my expectation with this one
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a pizzelle machine years ago, it worked well for about 10 years,,, I got this one for this years christmas pizzelle's and it took half the time to make twice as much. I used the recipe that was given, just added more anise and they were perfect. above my expectation with this one,,, it is a must have for all pizzelle makers !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Thick Batter, but fun
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing and bought it for making Stroop Waffles. However, the latch is plastic and not meant for the thicker batter used in stroop waffles, so it snapped off the first time we used it. We've recently discovered the joy of homemade ice cream cones using this press and these forms:
customer_reviews.author: Solumadur

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works great, superb quality and makes great pizzeles. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Happyday

customer_reviews.title: Avoid and Run Away
customer_reviews.text: If I would have written a review after first purchasing this, of course I would of loved it....but just wait after half a dozen uses or so and it is finished. Nothing "pro" or "choice" about it. It is a throw away appliance. Yes, I cleaned and used it correctly, but after using it a handful of times, it now consistently sticks and ruins every single cone, light or dark, no difference. The last four uses I have used a spatula to peel off the cone but now it is beyond hope for even that. Mine is going in the TRASH can today! It's no wonder it is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hale

customer_reviews.title: Glad I replaced first defective unit.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return my first puzzler maker from Amazon Warehouse when it was dead on arrival. Persevered and ordered another and made my first batch of 60 today. Takes only heaping teaspoon of batter per cookie. Will made nice little seasonal gifts to friends and desert trays for meetings and church dinners
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: can't wait to get cooking
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use this yet, but it arrived safely, no damage, on time and once opened seems well made and sturdy. Excited to make the pizzelles my grandmother used to bring me every time she visited as a kid. Came with clear directions for use and care and a few recipes, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allega

customer_reviews.title: Would give it zero stars if I could.  Wish I had spent my money on a product that was useful.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use with the pizzelle recipe my family has made for generations. There is no temperature control, the iron is way too hot and the press is paper thin so there is no body left to the cookie. I have attempted three times and had the same result every time. Burnt on the outside and paper thin cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using an old-fashioned pizzelle iron that you hold over a flame. Very tedious work. I thought I'd give an electric one a try. Took a little time management as when I followed the directions they came out too dark. I backed off the time and voila!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Wise

customer_reviews.title: The cannoli forms and cream horn molds are just wonderful to work with and clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine for my sister, in three weeks she used it everyday be 2. She's made every flavor available and then some. The cannoli forms and cream horn molds are just wonderful to work with and clean. We can't say enough for Chefs Choice, it's like a professional grade machine you'd find in a restaurant. We're so pleased, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: marianne s.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my mom's pizzelle machine for 40 years. I finally decided that I'd like to have one of my own. I love this machine, easy to use, makes perfectly thin, crisp pizzelles. I highly recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: missdiane

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizzelle Maker I've Purchased to Date
customer_reviews.text: I can't remark on durability because I have not had this too long, but best pizzelle maker I've had in a long time. These come out paper thin and takes almost no time at all for them to cook. For those of you who like a thicker pizzelle, I would just not press down on the handle. I definitely would repurchase this but hopefully it will last longer than other makers I've purchased in the past and I won't need to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyLady

customer_reviews.title: Ok for generic Pizelle press
customer_reviews.text: Bought this since my old one died. It worked ok, just wish I had remembered to but one with a dial that controls how cooked the cookies come out as they come out pretty close to burnt if you judge but the indicator. Wouldn’t purchase again if I had to do it over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried making cannoli's by hand and they were just Ok, but then i purchased this Pizzelle Maker and my first batch turned out amazing and people i shared them with were thinking that i bought them. I was so happy with this item and i would for sure purchase another as a gift for anyone that enjoys cooking or baking. This company is Top Notch.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Hesitated to purchase this with coating, but am very pleased with the machine. Makes cookies just like Gramma’s!!! Clean up is simple and recipes included with the iron are great.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Best, super thin as they should be.
customer_reviews.text: Dont forget anise seeds! Recipe that comes with it is perfect. Just like South Philly makes them. Superthin without crumbling. Crispy! Dark or light, they are perfect. Best I have had in years. I cook 60 seconds for browner tone. Dont try to make them with carbquick or artificial sweetener. Had to toss the whole batch. Yuck yuck yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Pm

customer_reviews.title: you don't need to do anything with them like make waffle cones
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for every house. Seriously, Pizzelle are delicious, you don't need to do anything with them like make waffle cones, just make them as cookies and try to eat around to get the inner circle! :) Same pattern that I remember from my childhood, and they make very consistent cookies (heat doesn't keep increasing like on some of the older pizzelle models)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Addona

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful. 30 seconds per batch is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a very old unit given to me by my mother. It is my first foray into pizelle making. It is wonderful. 30 seconds per batch is perfect. Of course you will have to have a wonderful recipe but you can count on the cookies coming out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Dough does not stick!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word! This is fantastic. I struggled so long with my old iron. I had to spray Pam with each dollop of dough. If not, the pizzels would stick, break, or crack! This new one was a breeze. No sticking and it cooked pizzels in seconds. Love! The photo shows the iron after cooking an entire batch. Not a crumb to be found.
customer_reviews.author: Janice A. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great pizzelle's!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife and she loves it! Makes perfect pizzelle's. This is the one you need.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Surprise your self, the best easy cookie ever!
customer_reviews.text: Once past the learning curve, easy pezy. We use a different recipe than the one provided, more butter, a lot more flavor, and only 10 seconds to “bake”. Chill the dough overnight and use a small ice cream scoop, make a lot of little batter balls, then go for it! 2 cookies every 10 seconds, try not to eat one every time!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Blackmer

customer_reviews.title: Pizzelle Maker
customer_reviews.text: This one replaced my mothers of 40 years. WOW WOW WOW.............outstanding and the sweeter recipe is a 10+ Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Gargiulo

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine if you aren’t a real Italian because no one ...
customer_reviews.text: PIZZELLES ARE TOO THICK!!! No way to smash the machine down and get them thinner so I had to bust out my old, failing machine to finish my batch. It’s fine if you aren’t a real Italian because no one would know any better, but I’d be crusified if I showed up to any family event with these.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy (:

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My very first try making Pizzells and with this machine it was a success!!!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make Pizelles, and it worked out well. It comes with recipes and suggestions, which is good. It was well packaged, too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Very successful first try. Takes a little practice getting the batter to the correct consistency, the right measurement to prevent overflow and the perfect cook time.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve bought a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box/works great obviously a lot different from traditional irons but once I got my footing it was all downhill Will be purchasing another one in the future, FYI last iron I would do a 20 count this iron I do a 10 count
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Pizzelles
customer_reviews.text: The pizzella just became my favorite cookie! The pizzella iron was so simple, quick and easy to use! It really didn't take long to make a batch of these great tasting cookie. I can't wait to male more and try all different kinds of flavors. It wiped clean after use also.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Sikon

customer_reviews.title: Cooks fast but not crispy
customer_reviews.text: I like my Pizzelles crispy. This cooked them fast (less then 30 seconds) but I could not get them crispy/crunchy. Maybe I have to change my recipe but I prefer a one minute cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my boyfriend. He has used it a couple of times and likes it! It's fast and easy to use, and the pizzelle come up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Addition for Bakers
customer_reviews.text: A family tradition almost lost with time, until I got my Pizzlle Pro. Quick,Clean Wonderful Old World Results with new world technology. Recipes included. Bring on the Holidays !
customer_reviews.author: SCTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best One Yet
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few Pizzelle makers over the years , and so far this one has been the best at even baking. Heats up really fast and cleans up easily, made about 200 dozen, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and the price beats most others
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and the price beats most others. My girlfriend kept asking to get the more expensive one, but I know she only shops on price. I got this and she loves it. Just because it's cheaper doesn't ALWAYS mean it's not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pizzelles every time!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pizzelle iron I have ever used. No preparation is needed before starting to make the pizzelles. (No greasing the iron or spraying with cooking spray...nothing, just plug it in and heat it up) Once the iron is hot just pore on the batter and the cookies are ready in 20 seconds, perfect every time. No sticking. Just wipe with a damp cloth when you’re done.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi66

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I reviewed so many before I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I reviewed so many before I bought this one and am very happy with it. Have used it twice over the holidays & very easy. What I found helpful though, after trial & error, was to not latch it closed when cooking the pizzelles because the batter will run out the sides of the iron. Again it's trial & error on length of time & how much dough to use. ..according to the users preference on how they like their cooked pizzelles. I did about 40-45 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: angela mercer

customer_reviews.title: User information
customer_reviews.text: Just sharing--- if you purchase this item please be aware that it runs hot and there is no temperature adjustment. However, once you get the hang of it you'll be fine but if there is one with an adjustable temperature knob I would buy that one instead.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizzelle every time
customer_reviews.text: Made perfect pizzelle in just a few seconds. Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY L. D'ATTOMO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pizelle Maker - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this Pizelle maker, works beautifully! Highly recommend to any other Pizzelle lovers, they are so versatile! You can use them as cookies, decorate them for parties, mold them into little bowls, canolli shells, ice cream cups or cones. Just wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!An awesome Pizzelle Maker!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome machine!! I have made a lot of pizzelles with this and it always comes out good. The cleaning is so easy!! I never had any problems even when I put too much it still didn't make a mess of the machine. It does get hot so make sure you watch and time this babies!! I love this machine!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherie Ann Glino

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy ...used them for cookie swap.
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. Made over 100 the first use ..took no time and my cookies for cookie swap we're done..no cookie sheets to wash!
customer_reviews.author: Paula H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Nice Nice
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fast. Can really makes a lot in an 1/2 hour. and its non stick..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I really like pizzelles. This is very easy to use. Still fussing with the heat and amounts for each one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last as long as I had hoped it would
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but it does not heat evenly all the time. I just bought it in February and am disappointed it did not last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Gabel

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pizzelle maker of my own for almost 20 years....every year my daughter borrows it to make her own batch. This year I bought this for her and as both were sitting on the kitchen counter it was hard to tell them apart. This brand made the cookies just as good, though the recipe was slightly different and the cookies came out a little thicker. Other than that, I am please....so is she!
customer_reviews.author: Curl up with a book

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a real talent in the kitchen. This Pizelle Machine is easy to use...my neighbors loved the cannolis!
customer_reviews.author: p s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this, bought it to make Russian style trubochki and works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Pizzelles made easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gem. We made our first batch today and it went flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs too hot. uneven baking. pizzelles are too ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs too hot. uneven baking. pizzelles are too thin, not anything close to traditional
customer_reviews.author: srjack

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does not have temperature control and wish it had a timer
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Works good! There is a light on it
customer_reviews.text: Works good! There is a light on it, however it is not really so much an indication of when your item is done. You really have to gauge and count your seconds. other than that, I like it and it cleans up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Mendes Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Less than impressed.....without a temperature control dial Pizzelles are too browned ! If you take them off so the color is lighter, the texture isnt right. Don't waste your money. Get a Cuisinart iron with a sliding control for light, med, or browned.
customer_reviews.author: beth dzurko

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: 20 seconds per 2 waffles? I love it! Used it to make sweet waffles out of almond flour, salty waffles from a rice flour for sandwiches or just to snack on. Can cover them right away to keep them soft, or let them cool without a cover - straight or rolled. Anything you want and super fast. It takes a little while for it to cool off but I can live with it. Very excited!
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I’d never made pizzelles before. I didn’t even have any First time user pizzelles that has to be thrown away. The first one was even perfect. So easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soggy pizzelles
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get the pizzelle crispy enough. They bend and are too moist. This is not as good as our last two from different manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Zingara

customer_reviews.title: Now I can make my own!
customer_reviews.text: Used to get these from a friend but now I make my own with this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to make these Pizzelle and when I got the machine I made a patch right away. It was great - everything worked exactly as described. Very easy - cant wait to make a few batches for the holiday. Everyone at work loved the pizzelle's I brought in. LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A Pettlon

customer_reviews.title: Super fast pizzelle maker.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pizzelle maker. Recipes that are included leave something to be desired. After modifications a crisp, great tasting cookie was achieved!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rives

customer_reviews.title: How much time does it take the perfect cookie?
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I do not like about this machine is that it is difficult to judge when the cookies are done so you have to stand there and watch it at all times when making the Cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Loggia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I always wanted one and we now have pizzelles, yeah
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Shire

customer_reviews.title: Old pizzelle iron bit the dust...
customer_reviews.text: After 30+ years, my old pizzelle maker bit the dust. Just finished my first batch of pizzelles in my new maker...easy, works great! They included a ‘roller’ to make cannoli, so I may try making them...
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Trovero

customer_reviews.title: Did not like how it cooked puzzle pretty much cooked it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not like how it cooked puzzle pretty much cooked it to fast and burned part of it and other part not cooked hardly at all. I have had other makers for pizzelles and cook more evenly. Gets hot way too fast and cooks way too fast. Tried not cooking as long but was not right either
customer_reviews.author: chris goody

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: great machine, wonderful to use making lots of these. Friends can't get enough of them
customer_reviews.author: cheryl smeets

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My friend had one. I tried it and had to get it! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item, I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works great, no sticking, pizzelle turn out perfect...I use Mary Bruno's recipe ( online )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it my old pizzelle maker wouldn't heat up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it my old pizzelle maker wouldn't heat up and searched online for a new one. Read the reviews and decided to buy it. Made my first batch last night and was very easy to use. Makes them very fast compared to my old unit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dibari

customer_reviews.title: ... with the machine for Pizelles and they came out great. Nothing stuck to the machine and I made ...
customer_reviews.text: After searching many sites and reading reviews I picked this one I used a recipe that came with the machine for Pizelles and they came out great. Nothing stuck to the machine and I made over 100.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it..non stick surface is great..so much better than the 50+ year old one I had.Great value
customer_reviews.author: Deborah  Debiak

customer_reviews.title: Quick and tastey end product
customer_reviews.text: My wife who is a native born Sicilian and came to America as a teen likes this machine. We've been married over 50 years and she's been making pizzelle's since being a young girl in the old country. She wants me to add that she started under the excellent tutelage of her Mom and refined her expertise from there. I just enjoy the end result of her skills.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dell

customer_reviews.title: PJ's Pizzelles and Cannoli
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and after some experimenting with the portion of mix it went really fast. When removing pizzelle from iron you do need to take some care, but with a plastic spatula the rounds came out without any tears. Happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Best cookie plates ever!
customer_reviews.text: Had such a great time making pizzelle cookies over Christmas. Made me look like a baking rock star! Everyone's cookie plates have gingerbread and sugar cookies. No one had these! Super fast cooking, nothing sticks to it, and makes me look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Makes beautiful Pizzelles!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time ever to make pizzelles, and I want to make sure I got a good product. I went by the ratings that were given on amazon and I agree that it is a good products. Everyone loved my pizzelles which made me very happy. I'm not a good baker and I need all the help I can get, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Rossi

customer_reviews.title: I am sure I will get much use and enjoyment from it
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one of these; thank you, I am sure I will get much use and enjoyment from it.
customer_reviews.author: Theta Cerveri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This pizzelle maker is an excellent product. It is completely non stick and reaches temperature after use in seconds. You can make 2 pizzelles in 20 seconds. I would definitely recommend this pizzelle. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene  Arcelay

customer_reviews.title: Fast cooking
customer_reviews.text: This baker cooks pizzelles SO much faster than my old Villa Ware. I think it results in the pizzelles looking burnt very quickly, and having a much darker color than I’m used to. Other than that it is a good device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Cookies are ready in 15-20 seconds. Highly recommend this pizzelle maker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed making all kinds of goodies ( cookies, waffle bowls and cannolis)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. D Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great pizzelle iron
customer_reviews.text: Fast cycle time, well built. Recipe book was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The chefs choice pizzelle maker is wonderful! The only drawback is that the iron gets very hot and it one needs to readjust then either it had to be turned off or one has to use mits...and it’s hard to get the kids to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica G Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Iron
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I had one for about 40 years that was perfect until it died. I was worried getting a non stick, but it is wonderful! Perfect for my needs. And they aren’t to thick!!
customer_reviews.author: luvmywahlbergs

customer_reviews.title: Love this iron!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pizzelle iron. It took me a few tries to get the timing right as it does heat up fast. It takes about 15 - 20 (max) seconds to make 2 cookies. I grew up in an Italian household making these cookies every holiday. This iron made the process super easy!
customer_reviews.author: JJJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I made pizelles for Passover while observing the Feast of Unleavened Bread. They were so fast to make and clean up was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Qualiy Pizelle Maker
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, and works well. No like the italian made I had from 1979 but a decent replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Everhart

customer_reviews.title: Now every day can be a pizzelles day!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the perfect pizzelles maker, one like my grandparents used to have. This is it! So happy with my purchase. Makes great size pizzelles with a very tasty recipe included.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizzelle Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is the closest pizelle iron to the villaware I had for years , the non stick surface is a plus as the pizzelles just slide off . You can make them in no time at all . The cord wraps around the bottom for easy storage . It is sturdy and made very well I would recommend this item . I have purchased other brands and they went right back to the store
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Creasia-Twist

customer_reviews.title: ... have wanted this for years and finally purchased this wonderful pizzelle maker and I am totally satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this for years and finally purchased this wonderful pizzelle maker and I am totally satisfied with it! It is worth every penny I spent!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My family and friends raved. So happy
customer_reviews.author: rgelbar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizzelles
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas present. She really liked it and just before our holiday party we made our first batch of pizzelles. This machine spits them out quickly (17 seconds) and easily. Once we determined the right amount of batter, we were a pizzelle assembly line! We just used the basic recipe that came in the book and we were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Christian F Schmid

customer_reviews.title: I love the speed in making a batch
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time making pizzelles and I will be making them again! I love the speed in making a batch, and a couple of friends who are very good bakers told they were nicely done- high compliment!
customer_reviews.author: Avis Ganoe

product_meta.title: Chef’sChoice 834 PizzellePro Toscano Nonstick Pizzelle Maker Features Baking Indicator Light Consistent Even Heat Press Delicious Pizzelles in Seconds, 2-Slice, Silver
product_meta.description: Maintaining holiday traditions and celebrating festive occasions just got a little easier with the Chef's Choice pizzellepro Toscana Twin pizzelle express bake model 834
feature_bullets: Features instant temperature recovery so it's always ready to bake and non-stick baking surface for easy removal when cooking is complete
Make two 4-3/4-inch pizzelles in under 30 seconds!
Locking latch results in uniform thickness every time! Consistent, even heating bakes perfectly every batch
Perfect size for making cannoli; recipes included
